item.description:
Sunday, May 6th, 2012 


 


Sunrise Beltane 


Hampton Beach, NH 


 


You're invited to wake early Sunday, May 6th, and join members of the Moonpool Coven for a joyous celebration of the Beltane! As the sun crests over the horizon, the fires return to ensure a good growing season for the seeds we have planted. 


 


Activities are planned to start at 4:30AM. Bring your drums and rattles, weather appropriate clothing, and get 


 


 


 


 


 


ready to have a great time coaxing the first rays of light up over the clouds. 


 


 


 


 


 


We plan on breakfast after the activities. 


 


 


 


 


 


 


 


 


 


 


 


More details coming, 


 


We look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Park in front of Ashworth by the Sea
item.name: Sunrise Beltane Service
